data.title: DO NOT UPLOAD
data.text:
Please note that the following lists of anime/manga is far from complete.

The list does not update automatically; it gets updated whenever someone updates it, and that does not happen on a frequent basis. If you feel this is an issue and that all licensing information should be accessible from this page, you are welcome to commit your time and help update it; just register an account, from the top-right link on the page.

Contents

Cartoon Network • Funimation (OSTs) • NIS America • Digital Manga Inc. • FAKKU Books • Aniplex • Fuji Television Network, Inc.

Torrent Content Upload Guidelines

We only accept complete, Anime/manga-related Series/Movies/OVAs/printed materials. We also allow Live Action adaptations (of anime/manga and related games/eroge/visual novels).

The following content is not allowed to be uploaded (offers will be rejected):

Loli/shota material*

Anything on the 4 DO NOT UPLOAD lists below.

Video files without subtitles

May only be added if subtitles are not needed (no dialog) or if permission to upload it is given (ask in the Uploaders' Forum first)

Releases without Japanese audio, unless:

The original language is not Japanese (e.g. Afro Samurai)

There is no other version available (i.e. for very rare titles)

Incomplete series

Complete seasons/story arcs may be allowed if the show/manga in question is very long (clarify in the Uploaders' Forum first)

We will consider allowing incomplete manga up to the end of the latest story arc if the manga is at least 10 volumes long OR 5 years old.

Fan-made material including doujinshi (artbooks and manga MUST be official). For more info and exceptions see here.

Software, or any content that has to be installed.

Content ripped from games (cinematic cut scenes, CG images, etc.)

ISOs or any Disc Image Format (including direct DVD/BD/HDDVD-rips, direct remuxes and .ts/.m2ts files of anime).

Archive files (zip, rar, 7z, gz, bz2, etc) are allowed only for manga.

Manga torrents should be offered as released by the scanlation group.

See also: What should I put in my torrents?

Upscaled releases are strongly discouraged, unless it is the best version available.

Live Action music videos of songs that stand alone from an anime.

Promotional videos (PV) for artists' singles that happen to be used for an anime's opening/ending are not allowed.

If the songs were made specifcally for the anime, such as character songs, then a concert of the voice actors singing them would be acceptable.

* If the majority of the work is allowed by our rules, exceptions may apply. Staff will make the final decision on that. See Format Preferences for details on how we want our content packaged.

See Why is some content on the blacklist? if you are unfamiliar with the blacklist system.

Material not allowed on BakaBT

Cartoon Network

including Adult Swim

FLCL Progressive (July 2019)

Funimation

Site: http://www.funimation.com/

ANN Listing: http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/company.php?id=6515

Funimation Licensing Page: http://www.funimation.com/copyright 22 June 2013 archive

Non-US mirror of Licensing Page: http://changedmy.name/funimation-license-mirror/

In addition to fully licensed for home video titles, we do not allow the uploading of rips taken from their streaming service. Fansubs of online streaming only titles are still allowed.
